PRICE

Following prices and billing thresholds
are subject to change without prior notice.

Free and Anonymous
$0 / month

Can use all SkyBridge® technologies anonymously and free of charge under the following limitations:

A maximum of 2 concurrent connections per IP address.
A maximum of 200 KB of data transmitted per IP address per day.
A maximum of 120 minutes of connection time per IP address per day.
Service alias has to be unique globally. A service alias is the name by which a computer is know to other computers, which they must use to send data to this computer.
Get it free
Paid Account
$14 / month

Can use all of the SkyBridge® technologies without any limitation.

Service aliases only needs to be unique within the account. This means that two accounts can use the same alias without conflict.

Data usage:

Connection time: $0.02/hour
Data transfer:
     <= 1 GB/month: Free 
     > 1 GB/month: $0.6/GB
Request access
*When such limits are breached, user’s code gets exceptions.
